random_quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
random_quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

random_quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
random_quotes.author: Steve Jobs

random_quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
random_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

random_quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
random_quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

random_quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
random_quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

random_quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
random_quotes.author: Confucius

random_quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
random_quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

random_quotes.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
random_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

random_quotes.quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
random_quotes.author: Charles Kingsleigh (Alice in Wonderland)

random_quotes.quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
random_quotes.author: Steve Jobs

random_quotes.quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
random_quotes.author: Unknown

random_quotes.quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
random_quotes.author: Christian D. Larson

random_quotes.quote: It's not about how bad you want it, it's about how hard you're willing to work for it.
random_quotes.author: Unknown

random_quotes.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
random_quotes.author: Sam Levenson

random_quotes.quote: The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday.
random_quotes.author: Unknown

random_quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
random_quotes.author: Mark Twain

random_quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
random_quotes.author: Peter Drucker

random_quotes.quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
random_quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

random_quotes.quote: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.
random_quotes.author: Chris Grosser

random_quotes.quote: Success is not just about making money. It's about making a difference.
random_quotes.author: Unknown

random_quotes.quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
random_quotes.author: Norman Vaughan

random_quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
random_quotes.author: Steve Jobs

random_quotes.quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
random_quotes.author: Colin R. Davis

random_quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
random_quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

random_quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
random_quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

random_quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
random_quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

random_quotes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
random_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

random_quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
random_quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

random_quotes.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
random_quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

random_quotes.quote: Your limitation—it's only your imagination.
random_quotes.author: Unknown

random_quotes.quote: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
random_quotes.author: Unknown

random_quotes.quote: Great things never come from comfort zones.
random_quotes.author: Unknown

random_quotes.quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
random_quotes.author: Unknown

random_quotes.quote: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
